title: Bikerumor Editor’s Choice Awards 2021 – Jessie-May’s Best Bike & Gear Picks
content:
I think it’s fair to say that most modern mountain bike frames are actually pretty good nowadays. In my fifteen or so years of riding, I’ve never ridden a bike and promptly said, “Oh my word, that bike is absolutely terrible, no one buy it”. Sadly, the same thing can’t be said for bike components.

author: Jessie-May Morgan
